item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 9, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Chemistry Nobel: Computational protein design and protein structure prediction (154 points | 99 comments)
2. John Carmack on Inlined Code (210 points | 132 comments)
3. Addition Is All You Need for Energy-Efficient Language Models (128 points | 34 comments)

8. One Genius' Lonely Crusade to Teach a Computer Common Sense (45 points | 25 comments)
9. My first game with Carimbo, my homemade engine (247 points | 133 comments)
10. How a Gas Compressor Station Works (21 points | 8 comments)

12. Otter Wiki: A minimalistic wiki powered by Python, Markdown and git (109 points | 20 comments)
13. A free and open internet shouldn't come at the expense of privacy (83 points | 56 comments)
14. On the Nature of Time (285 points | 179 comments)
15. European govt air-gapped systems breached using custom malware (208 points | 148 comments)

21. Google DeepMind scientists win Nobel chemistry prize (5 points | discuss)
22. Show HN: Kotlin Money (378 points | 208 comments)
23. Regardless of age, quitting cigarette smoking will add years to your life (6 points | 1 comment)
24. Shrinking augmented reality displays into eyeglasses to expand their use (38 points | 5 comments)
25. Lunar Lake's iGPU: Debut of Intel's Xe2 Architecture (91 points | 35 comments)
26. Trap – Transformers in APL (72 points | 22 comments)
27. Nobel Prize in Physics awarded to John Hopfield and Geoffrey Hinton [pdf] (860 points | 738 comments)
28. Canvases versus Documents (68 points | 10 comments)
29. Differential Transformer (506 points | 164 comments)
30. Instant (YC S22) is hiring a founding engineer to help build a modern Firebase ( | hide)
